name: Hanging Around
description:
A team entry for GMTK 2021.

Swing your buddy to escape the rising lava! You'll have to traverse multiple hazards to get the end.

Thank you for taking a look at our jam game. It's not much, but we had a lot of fun making it. We hope you enjoy your time with our prototype.

Programming by Randy Butts and Alex Kennedy

Music by Jesse Walker
